Read a message from the link.

Allocates memory, returns handle

Parameters:
link Private descriptor for pipe/socket.
buf Buffer to read into, must include size for kuc_hdr
maxsize Maximum message size allowed
transport Only listen to messages on this transport (and the generic transport)
